attributes.action: All properties with mould to be given the help they need!
attributes.additional_details: Give tenants the help to get rid of mould as keeping up with growing mould can cause the tenants to become really ill
attributes.background: I have occurring mould in all of my rooms of my flat and maintaining mould constantly is tiring me as they mould keeps coming back. This is going to make me ill.

rejection.details:
It's already a legal requirement that homes must be fit for human habitation. You can read more here

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/homes-fitness-for-human-habitation-act-2018/guide-for-tenants-homes-fitness-for-human-habitation-act-2018
